document_data.name: Zephir
document_data.mainbody: The '''Zephir''' was a small tavern located in the village of [[Amkethran]] in [[Calimshan]]. It was frequented by the mercenaries of [[Balthazar]] around [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Exterior: The tavern was part a series of buildings, embedded into the rock and connected to each other by wooden ladders. The Zephir was the bottom-left most building, and had a small chimney built onto it.
document_data.Interior: The tavern was divided into two rooms: the main bar room, and the sleeping quarters. There were only two sets of tables and chairs, and a small bar. The sleeping quarters were packed together and contained four large beds.
document_data.Services: The bar was manned by [[Zakee Rafeha]], a kind gentleman. He may have informed [[Gorion's Ward]] about the lack of popularity for the ruler Balthazar, and his exploits.
